snippet.title: Alisa - Premium Edition Games - Physical Switch Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Alisa is a classic 90s style horror-themed action-adventure game developed and published by Casper Croes set in a 1920s-inspired fantasy universe. You play as an Elite Royal Agent named Alisa who, while chasing a wanted criminal, ends up in an old Victorian mansion. You'll have to find a way out while being haunted by mechanized creatures. Can you survive the Dollhouse?

What's waiting for you....

- Classic Survival Horror gameplay
- Real Pre-rendered backgrounds
- Eccentric currency and item shop
- Dresses and Armours with unique player stats boosts

"Don't open that door!"

- Weapon load-outs
- A large variety of enemies and locations
- "Soulsborne"-difficulty
- Surprises around every corner
- A weird sense of humour
- A nostalgic trip to the late 1990s

E-mail Frank at Frank@PremiumEditionGames.com for press inquiries and questions.

https://premiumeditiongames.com/

About Premium Edition Games

Premium Edition Games' specialty is high quality releases created with the ingenuity and passion inspired by the amazing work game developers have put into game creation. We take great pride in helping preserve games physically for posterity. We highlight every release by going over all the items in detail and interview all the people who are helping make it a reality.
